website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech PlayGear Amp is a great audio solution for users looking to get more sound out of their movies, music, and games on the PSP.
pros: includes case and adjustable PSP stand
can use both AC adapter and battery power
compatible with any device that has a standard headphone minijack
cons: Closer to backpack size than pocket size
weak bass response results in thin sound
exposed speaker cones are vulnerable to damage

customer_reviews.title: Ok for home
customer_reviews.text: It has a good sound, the only bad thing is that it is not very practical to take them on a trip because it consumes a lot of battery and is not rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Jukusan

customer_reviews.title: Great set of speakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers for my Toshiba Gigabeat. The sound is great and you can really crank up the volume. The carrying case is pretty nice too. I'm very happy with this product. Can't beat the price for these speakers. ***I've been using this set of speakers for a couple of months now and they still work great. I've had many positive comments on the style and sound from my co-workers.
customer_reviews.author: Spotted Cow

customer_reviews.title: Decent little speaker set
customer_reviews.text: While this attractive little speaker set isn't going to hit you up with bass, doesn't mean that you aren't going to be pleased with the full range of sound they are capable of producing, excellent speaker for Spoken word/audiobooks, and even better for movies with lush full soundscapes. Not really for rocking out but a perfect replacement for missing or gigantic PC speakers, comes with 2 patch cords and works with almost any MP3 player, game system etc. Nice case and AAA battery optional operation as well. Pleased
customer_reviews.author: P. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Quick delivery. The set is actually quite nice and much more powerful than you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Panteral3

customer_reviews.title: What sound for such little speakers
customer_reviews.text: The sound from these is just amazing!!! For the price I paid 13.99 it is very well worth it. The added carrying case is a big plus too. Dont listen to the negatives, they are fantastic. And BTW they sell these at Game Spot formally EB Games for $59.99 and I paid 13.99!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Trombley

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best external sound solution for the PSP
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. It looks good, doesn't feel flimsy and has great sound for the price and size of the unit. It's also extremely portable and the case is decent. Though I will say that the review that describes this as producing sound on par to that of a top-notch portable stereo is a bit overstated. I'd say it's more like decent computer speakers. Then again, I'm kind of a sound snob. I'd have given it 5 stars if the sound could rattle my living room windows. One minor bad point, the cradle didn't fit my PSP Slim God of War Edition. Hardly a deal-breaker though. All in all an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: NC Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what I need it for. Speakers are powerful and the price was not bad. Mount really only works for the psp 1000 though. the 2/3000 sit well enough but the plugs do not
customer_reviews.author: FV

customer_reviews.title: Incredible *****
customer_reviews.text: First impression = incredible Build quality is solid. I plugged my pc via optical cable and tested my old koss porta pro headphone. Sound volume is 3 times louder, sound stage and mid tones increased. I was not expect that performance. You wont regret if you buy this dac.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Aksu

customer_reviews.title: Dang good sound!
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the size of these speakers the sound quality is fantastic. clear and loud you can bump the music all through the house. These are even better than the 40$ speakers on my computer. Even if you dont own a PSP you can still use these with any device with an earphone jack. Do not pass down these speakers
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Sound
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of sound from these small speakers! Even when you turn them up really loud the sound does not become distorted. I even use them with my iPod and the music sounds great. For less than $20, I really think they are a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Lonestar81

customer_reviews.title: Best PSP Speaker Set
customer_reviews.text: I just got my hands on the PlayGear Amp. It is a great set of speakers for the value. It gently cradles the PSP and the sound output is adequate for music, video games, and video entertainment. Of course this isn't your $250+ Bose system, but for under $20 it is unrivaled.
customer_reviews.author: M. Iriye

customer_reviews.title: great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker set for the price adds a low cost way to make it a mini stereo.
customer_reviews.author: SJH AZ

customer_reviews.title: great sound, great quality
customer_reviews.text: awesome sound and looks great with the psp ! I also have a sandisk sansa and the center "pocket" of the psp mounting bracket holds it perfect! the sound is great for both the psp and my mp3 player! I highly recommend this product and am probally gonna buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Chad SEXington III

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Well, I just got it and love it! Nice and clean design, good sound quality and very portable. It has a nice bag to carry it with your PSP, and the ac adapter. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Ocampo Ch

customer_reviews.title: Good amps
customer_reviews.text: Its not a theater surround system, but for what you pay these little speakers put out pretty good sound. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: zalutz

customer_reviews.title: good and not so good
customer_reviews.text: These is a nice little speaker system the downfall is the place where the PSP sets is a little hard to get the PSP to set the PSP in and still operate it it tips over so we just hook up the speakers and and don't really use the stand part they are nice little speakers
customer_reviews.author: Rea M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: PSP 2000 mod
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little speaker system for the money ( I got it for $20), but in order to use it with the newer slim PSP 2000 you have to modify it in order to hook up the speaker jack. On the left side of the stand you need to cut out a notch to fit the jack in it's proper place. I used an exacto knife and a very small pair of diagonal cutters. Also there are two small unnecessary tabs on the inside bottom of the stand which I cut off. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: JBN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound.. portable case..
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for 29.99 at target... Some on here are 45$ + not sure if they still sell in stores however... great sound.. nice looks.. worked fine for about a year... half of speakers JUST went out today.. searched for more on here, but tooo much money. someone also has the odacity to charge 750.00 for them??? wtf is that.
customer_reviews.author: David Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Speakers and PSP Stand for UMD Movie Viewing
customer_reviews.text: These little speakers offer a big kick. I tested them on my Resident Evil Apocolypse UMD and it passed with flying colors. The low talking was audible while the intense action was theatrically pleasing to the ears. Short of hooking the PSP up to actual speakers, this is the next best thing. It looks like the PSP and nestles it nicely in between the speakers in a well made stand. It also allows for portable usage through four AAA batteries, not included however. Good buy for those who enjoy UMD viewing either on the go or at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers... I got them for my PSP but i traded it for an x-box and an IPOD nano, and they worked really good with my nano. I got these from amazon for 13.00 (give or take) so i looked around to see about how much i saved and i was expecting somewhere around 25.00-30.00 dollars. When i went to Game Crazy (EB Games) and they were there for $60.00! I was excited to see how much i was saving, and these are very high quality speakers! Needless to say, no matter what your use is, these should get the job done for your budget...
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Langan

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!!! Cheap and Great Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good set of speakers for a while and these are the best ones i ever got. They are only $20 and they work better than those crappy, over priced ipod speakers. It goes very loud and can be either battery powered by 4 AAA's or connected to an outlet which comes with the speakers plus a protective case with a stand for your psp and 2 output wires one about 6" long and another about 12" long. this is a must buy for those who are looking for great quality speakers. I use them when i take a shower all the time but not in the shower (duh). Great speakers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Migoya

customer_reviews.title: Logitech PSP speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers were great- while they lasted. Four about 4 weeks I had great quality sound from these speakers. After that every time I hit the power switch it would make a horrible, loud buzzing sound, even if there was nothing hooked up to it and on battery power. I called Logitec support which had me hold for 20 without even talking to anyone. I emailed them and received preformulated responses that didn't even describe how to fix my problem. Logitec makes great products and I have many, but doesn't support them very well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K

customer_reviews.title: Cradle is not PSP Slim compatable
customer_reviews.text: PROs: Arrived in good time and in good condition. The sound is crisp and clear, exactly what I thought it would be. The second power cable is a major plus. CONs: The only thing about this product that disapointed me was the fact that the cradle was made for the PSP-1001. It doesnt say that anywhere that I could find so i am letting you know.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pulsipher

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound for the value. It is great for traveling and traveling with style. The only small issue I have with this is the stand where you put the PSP on doesn't fit the new PSP's. So I just don't use the stand - I lay it on the table or something and plug everything in. I recommend it. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hu

customer_reviews.title: great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the sound and volume that comes out of this little speaker system. I have an ipod with a couple of expensive speakers and this one sounds just as good or better and it only cost $13, it also came in 2 days, wow, great product. It even comes with a cool case.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hoeft

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Its size is small however sound is almost perfect.I mean you cannot get hi-fi quality for this size but you can listen medium quality music.I'm using in my room.the result is good enough.Price is perfect.Material of the product looks like psp console's.
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Ample volume for most any situation. Clear sound reproduction for such small speakers. Logitech has been making small computer speakers for years and once again they created a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this gift from the same one that got me started on the Game Boy Advance SP, and as usual, he's right on the money with this. He knows he's done good... Great Sound, clarity is great... and compact is key... Mahalo Koma... Will miss you lots... Until our paths cross again...
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ng

customer_reviews.title: Verry Niice
customer_reviews.text: worth the money. cant handle too loud sound, gets distorted but otherwise fine quality. Good base. Looks spiffy.
customer_reviews.author: mobster

customer_reviews.title: Near Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting too much from this but as soon as I turned it on I was amazed at the quality of sound you get. Top notch stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: It is a pain to use. The cradle does not stay attached, it is hard to use the PSP when in the cradle. The sound is okay, but the design is poor. Cheap piece of plastic, not user friendly. Better off buying a cheap pair of computer speakers. MBG
customer_reviews.author: CoCo

customer_reviews.title: Got these for $30 1 yr ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers in a store a year or two ago for $30. They're great speakers but for this price I'm looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Max P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It is very cheap and has very loud speakers. If you are trying to spend a little bit of money, then this is the speakers system for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Howard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty loud
customer_reviews.text: wow for speakers this little they are pretty load if u have a psp u should get this item.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: PLAY GEAR AMP
customer_reviews.text: I ACTUALLY BOUGHT THIS ITEM FOR MY BF THAT IS SHIPPING OVER SEAS....ITS A GREAT ITEM FOR THEM TO JUST HAVE TO LISTEN TO MUSIC OR MOVIES WHILE IN THEIR TENTS.....I THINK ITS GREAT FOR TRAVEL........
customer_reviews.author: Dawn V. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with one of the previous reviews. These speakers were great for about a week. I now have the buzzing sound and poor speaker quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williamson

product_meta.title: PSP PlayGear Amp
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Upgrade your PlayStation Portable's audio and enjoy full, rich sound. Versatile power and storage options make PlayGear Amp the ideal companion when you need great audio to go. Think you have to compromise to get good sound from small speakers? PlayGear Amp's matched quad micro drivers deliver remarkable performance in a small package. The custom-fitted cradle holds your PSP while you listen to music or watch movies. 

 The included, extra long audio cord lets you enjoy the superior sound even while gaming. Use the included deluxe travel case to store your speakers, cables and AC adapter when they're not in use. Once packed, these speakers are nearly as portable as the PSP itself! These speakers are compatible with any portable audio device that has a standard audio jack, and include a one-year warranty covering parts and service. 

 What's in the Box
Speakers, deluxe travel case, PSP cradle, audio cord, AC adapter, setup guide and user's manual, warranty card
feature_bullets: Custom-fit cradle holds your PSP, while you listen to music or watch movies
Protective traveling case organizes cables & speakers
Extra long audio cord lets you enjoy the superior sound even while gaming
Operates with included AC adapter or four AAA batteries (not incl.)
